# See http://www.robotstxt.org/wc/norobots.html for documentation on how to use the robots.txt file

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Sitemap: https://www.nuridol.net/sitemap.xml
Disallow: /cgi-bin
Disallow: /test
Disallow: /SERVICE
Disallow: /DATA
Disallow: /Rewrite
Disallow: /lib
Disallow: /security
Disallow: /info
Disallow: /example
Disallow: /infodata
Disallow: /Transfer
Disallow: /images
Disallow: /javascripts
Disallow: /stylesheets
Disallow: /start/view
